body:
Comment 8: 
It doesn't make sense for the compiler to give an error like that.  And I don't see why
this is related to CGO_ENABLED.  I don't understand how you got to the point that you
did.  The cmd/dist program ought to have created a file runtime/zgoos_${GOOS}.go that
defines theGoos.  It looks like perhaps you are setting GOOS and GOARCH without having
first built that GOOS/GOOARCH combo.  Do you think that might be what happened?
